title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.16.0.63 发布
author: xmdhs
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-5-21 15:06 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft基岩版 1.16 仍未发布，1.16.0.63 为其第9个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。

https://feedback.minecraft.net/h ... Windows-10-Android-

Crashes and Stability
崩溃与稳定性

Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复一些游戏中可能发生的崩溃。Fixed a crash when auto crafting 64 honey blocks from recipe book in survival MCPE-68604修复生存模式中，使用配方书合成 64 个蜂蜜块时发生的崩溃。Fixed an issue that could occur if the player equipped any piece of netherite armor, used a clear command to clear it, and then equipped another piece of netherite armor of the same type修复当玩家装备全套的下界合金盔甲时，使用 clear 命令清除后，可能会重新装备一套相同的下界合金盔甲的问题。Fixed a crash that could happen when a mob's state changed修复当生物的状态发生改变后，可能发生的崩溃。Fixed navigation.walk to handle the case where it is used on a flying entity, so that the flying entity will not cause lag while it is touching the ground修复了 navigation.walk 处理飞行中的实体的问题，这样当飞行中的实体落地后，就不会导致游戏卡顿了。

General
常规

Updated Mojang Studios loading screens使用新版的“Mojang Studios”加载界面。Nether biome distribution now better matches that in Minecraft: Java Edition下界的生物群系分布现在和 java 版更匹配了。Fixed issue where players on Xbox One may have errors accessing the Marketplace修复了当玩家使用 Xbox One 访问市场时，出现访问错误的问题。Improved reliability of loading characters MCPE-55968改善加载角色时的可靠性。Fixed an instance where a character can be lost when offline修复了离线状态下，可能导致角色丢失的问题。Fixed an issue that prevented achievements from being unlocked offline after reconnecting修复了当离线后又重新连接，导致阻止解锁成就的问题。Fix issue of incorrect player hand animations when using fishing rod in third person MCPE-63088修复了当玩家在第三人称模式下使用钓竿的不正确的动画。Fixed the Xbox main menu getting stuck forever after cancelling the sync popup box MCPE-53266修复了当取消了同步的提示框后，在主菜单永远卡住的问题。Secondary players in a splitscreen game will now animate properly when you look at them第二个玩家在分屏游戏中，当你看着他们，现在会显示正确的动画。Suspending and resuming the game will no longer make a player's model disappear MCPE-63119暂停和恢复游戏，将不再导致玩家的模型丢失。The second player's hands in a split screen game will no longer disappear when you look at them with the first player MCPE-58806分屏游戏中，现在你和第一个玩家看着第二个玩家时，第二个玩家手将不在会消失。Nether Bricks texture has been updated下界砖块的材质已经更新。Chiseled Netherbrick and Quartz Bricks textures are updated錾制下界砖块和石英砖的材质也更新了。Crimson Trap Door is now called Crimson Trapdoor"Crimson Trap Door" 现在叫 "Crimson Trapdoor"、Warped Forest are now more rare compared to other Nether biomes诡异森林现在相比其他下界群系更加稀有。When players enter Warped Forest, the previous music track now plays until it's finished当玩家进入诡异森林时，之前的音乐将会播放，直到放完。Bedrock Credits have been updated基岩版的鸣谢名单已更新。Fixed issue where experimental mode was not being enabled for clients when the server level has it enabled修复了服务端上启用了实验模式，而客户端上没有被启用的问题。Optimised sound loading - "load_on_low_memory" is now deprecated in sound_definitions.json, as all audio can now play on low memory devices优化了声音的加载。load_on_low_memory 现在不建议在 sound_definitions.json 中使用，因为现在所有的音频都能在小内存的设备上播放了。Fixed a world conversion issue that was causing some items in chunks to convert to Bedrock incorrectly修复了世界转换中，一些区块中的物品，被错误的转换成了基岩的问题。
 
Gameplay  
游玩  


Dyeing shulker boxes no longer causes items to vanish MCPE-64164染色潜影盒，将不在导致其中的物品消失。Fixed incorrect spawn position when set on top of a pressure plate MCPE-65487修复了当出生点设置在了压力板上，会导致重生的位置发生了错误的问题。Fixed issue where taking Arrows, Fireworks, or Nautilus shells into the offhand will break the offhand UI slot MCPE-64227修复了把箭，烟花，和鹦鹉螺壳放到副手，会导致副手物品栏的 ui 失效的问题。Fixed an issue where lava would drop uncooked food MCPE-74767修复了岩浆杀死生物后，会掉落未煮熟的食物的问题。Added fallback to world spawn if the Respawn Anchor spawn is obstructed增加了当重生锚被阻碍时，将会返回世界出生点。"You home bed was missing or obstructed" message shows again重新显示“你的床已遗失或被阻挡”的信息。"Respawn point set" message is now displayed for the Respawn Anchor in all cases MCPE-73159使用重生锚设置重生点，现在会在所有情况下发送“重生点已设置”的信息。Respawn Anchors can be charged without setting respawn point and without exploding outside the Nether MCPE-69044重生锚可以在没有设置出生点和没有在下界外爆炸的情况下充能。The Respawn Anchor can now have blocks placed against if it contains no charge重生锚现在可以在没有被充能的情况下放置。Villagers will now harvest crops regardless of what crop amounts they have in their inventory MCPE-67694村民现在将不管自己的背包中的作物，而去收购作物。XP orbs shoot in random directions once again MCPE-58715经验球现在将再像之前一样，随机的溅射。It's now impossible to use beds if there is no room for the player to stand next to or on top of the bed when they wake up MCPE-42881现在当床边和床上没有足够的空间让玩家醒来能站着时，将无法使用床。It's now impossible to interact with Piglins who are admiring golden items MCPE-69861现在将无法在猪灵检查你给它的金锭时，再给它金锭。Respawn anchors no longer destroy blocks when detonated underwater重生锚将不会在水下被引爆后摧毁方块。Respawn Anchor now plays an appropriate sound when it depletes MCPE-69265重生锚当它被耗尽时，现在会播放恰当的声音。Lodestone Compass is now supported in commands  MCPE-68994现在命令支持磁石指针。（比如 clear）Barrier blocks no longer generate in Bastion Remnants屏障将不会在堡垒遗迹中生成。Chests in Bastion Remnants now always generate with loot  MCPE-69003堡垒遗迹中的箱子，现在将总会生成战利品。Mobs no longer consume one of two Swords of the same material dropped in the same place生物将不在消耗掉在相同地方的相同材质的两把剑之一。Fixed Smithing table sound not playing while being used  MCPE-69066修复了锻造台在使用时不发出声音的问题。Respawn Anchor charging sound no longer plays in Basalt Delta biome  MCPE-69189重生锚将不会在玄武岩三角洲生物群系中播放声音。Lodestone and compass now play an appropriate sound磁石和指南针现在会播放恰当的声音。Twisting Vines Block is now called Twisting VinesTwisting Vines Block 现在被叫做 Twisting Vines （缠怨藤）'Oooh, shiny!' achievement now unlock when distracting a Piglin with a Gold Ingot by right-clicking“Oooh, shiny”成就现在可以通过使用金锭右键猪灵分散注意力获得。Twisting Vines and Weeping Vines are now destroyed, and popped as items, immediately when flooded缠怨藤和垂泪藤现在会在被水淹没时，被破坏，并作为物品掉落。Mined Nether Sprouts no longer produce an invalid item that could not be used MCPE-74339挖掘下界苗现在不会掉落无效且无法使用的物品。Moving blocks now have the correct collision box MCPE-62419移动方块现在会有正确的碰撞箱。Fire now properly converts to Soul Fire on Soul Sand and Soul Soil when Fire ticking is turned off  MCPE-69823现在灵魂沙和灵魂土上的火，会被正确的转换成灵魂火，当 gamerule dofiretick false 时。Campfires can now be crafted with charcoal MCPE-70862营火现在可以使用木炭制作。Using Quartz Block in a stonecutter now produces Quartz Slabs instead of Smooth Quartz slabs MCPE-57925现在切石机中使用石英块会产生石英台阶，而不再是平滑石英台阶。Dispenser now uses 1 glowstone when filling Respawn Anchor  MCPE-72686使用发射器给重生锚充能时，将会消耗一个萤石，而不是两个。Silk touch enchant now works on Respawn Anchor精准采集附魔将可以用于下界重生锚。Silk touch enchant and setBlock command now works on Crimson button, Warped button, Crimson hyphae, Stripped crimson hyphae, Warped hyphae, Stripped warped hyphae, Weeping vines, Twisting vines, Blackstone pressure plate, Polished blackstone button精准采集附魔和 setblock 命令现在可以用于：绯红木按钮，诡异木按钮，绯红菌核，去皮绯红菌核，诡异菌核，去皮诡异菌核，垂泪藤，缠怨藤，磨制黑石压力板，磨制黑石按钮。Chains can now be pushed by Pistons without breaking锁链现在可以被活塞推动而不会断裂。Soul Torches can now also be crafted with charcoal MCPE-70585灵魂火把现在也能用木炭合成了。Warped Fungus on a Stick can now be enchanted similar to Carrot on a Stick MCPE-70948诡异菌钓竿现在能够先胡萝卜钓竿一样被附魔了。Striders now take falling damage MCPE-70886炽足兽现在会收到摔落伤害。Baby Strider sitting on an adult Strider now freeze when its parent is on land MCPE-71413幼年的炽足兽站在成年的炽足兽上和它的父母们站在陆地上时。现在会被冻结。Striders movement speed has been adjusted to closer match Minecraft Java Edition炽足兽的移动速度，现在被调整为接近 java 版中的移动速度。Netherite items will not catch fire because they are fire resistant下界合金物品将不会着火，因为它们不怕火。Large Basalt Columns can no longer be over 10 blocks tall大型的玄武岩柱，将不会超过10格高。Basalt Deltas now have the correct blocks generating in the biome玄武岩三角洲现在会在正确的生物群系中生成。Blackstone Buttons, Pressure Plates, Slabs and Walls now have the right appearance on Maps磨制黑石按钮，木制压力板，台阶和墙，现在会正确的展现在地图上。Respawn Anchor can now only be mined by Diamond or Netherite Pickaxe MCPE-72102下界重生锚现在只能用钻石或者下界合金镐挖掘。Mobs now prefer Stone Sword over Gold Sword (except for Piglins!)生物现在会更加喜欢石剑，超过金剑（猪灵除外）Twisting Vines and Weeping Vines now emit correct sounds when broken缠怨藤和垂泪藤现在被破坏后会发出正确的声音。Chain now plays correct sound when placed锁链现在在被放置时，会发出正确的声音。Lodestone now requires a Pickaxe to be mined磁石现在需要用镐子挖掘。Many doors had their texture updated更新了许多门的材质Warped Stem and Crimson Stem now have the same mining time as Oak Log诡异菌柄和绯红菌柄现在有着和橡木原木相同的挖掘时间。Warped Planks or Crimson Plank slabs no longer appear as default in recipes for some items诡异木板和绯红木板台阶将不再出现再某些物品的默认配方中。Player no longer spawns on a block after relaunching the world while falling玩家坠落时，重启游戏将不会使玩家生成在方块上。Fixed an issue that could cause the player to respawn underwater修复了一些可能导致玩家在水下重生的问题。Netherite shovel can now be used to extinguish campfires MCPE-65730下界合金锹现在能用来熄灭营火。Soul soul can be mined more quickly with shovels now MCPE-65382灵魂土现在能够用铲子快速的挖掘。（这里 mojang 打错字了x）Crimson and Warped Hyphae (including stripped) can now be crafted into planks in Bedrock MCPE-73099绯红和诡异菌核（包括去皮）现在能够用来做成木板。Weeping Vines can now be grown using bone meal with dispensers MCPE-65660现在能通过用发射器来发射骨粉，催熟垂泪藤。


Mobs
生物

Fixed an issue where chickens on slabs wouldn't take damage from lava MCPE-74990修复了台阶上的鸡不会收到岩浆的伤害的一些问题。Hoglins should now always be pacified after fleeing from Warped Fungus疣猪兽从诡异菌逃离后，将始终保持平定。Mobs can now pathfind on Soul Sand blocks生物现在能在灵魂沙方块上寻路。Piglins can now outrun Hoglins猪灵现在能跑的比疣猪兽快。Hoglins will retaliate against crossbow wielding Piglins less frequently疣猪兽现在会更少的报复挥舞着弩的猪灵。Villagers no longer drop items they pick up村民现在当他们捡起物品时将不会掉落物品。Using Pickblock on Zoglin now gives Zoglin spawn egg对僵尸疣猪兽使用中键现在将会给与僵尸疣猪兽刷怪蛋Netherite helmet now renders properly on Piglins下界合金头盔现在会正确的在猪灵上渲染。Hoglins and Zoglins are now more resistant to knockback疣猪兽和僵尸疣猪兽现在有着更多的击退抗性。Piglins now make a retreating sound while fleeing from Soul Fire Torches, Soul Fire Lanterns and Soul Fire猪灵现在发出撤退的声音，直到它们逃离灵魂火把，灵魂灯笼，灵魂火。Piglins and Hoglins behavior while fleeing has been improved猪灵和疣猪兽逃跑时的行为得到了改善。Zoglin and Zombified Piglin no longer drown in lava僵尸疣猪兽和僵尸猪灵将不再淹死于岩浆。Changed many mobs' behavior while drowning in lava修改了许多生物岩浆在淹死时的行为Aggravated Piglins no longer barter恼火的猪灵将不在以物易物。Gold Ingot now always properly render in Piglins hand during bartering金锭将总是正确的在猪灵以物易物时的手上，正确渲染。Mobs should no longer consume items they pick up生物将不再消耗它们捡起的物品。Piglin now become angry when Trapped Chests are destroyed猪灵现在将会因为它们的陷阱箱被毁而生气。Hoglins no longer flee from Zoglins疣猪兽将不再逃离僵尸疣猪兽。The Zombified Piglin texture has been updated僵尸猪灵的材质已更新。Mobs that can equip helmet armor can now also equip Turtle Shell生物可以装备头盔，现在也能戴上海龟壳。Fixed an issue where tamed pets would occasionally disappear after transferring to or from the nether修复了把驯服的宠物从下界转移时，偶尔可能会消失的问题。Angry Bees are now slower MCPE-53689生气的蜜蜂现在飞的会比较慢。


Blocks
方块

Iron Bars and Glass Panes now connect to Walls MCPE-73989铁栏杆和玻璃板现在将可以连接到墙上。Hyphae blocks can now be crafted into their respective planks MCPE-73099菌核现在能用于制作各自的木板。Moving blocks now have the correct collision box  MCPE-62419移动方块现在将会有正确的碰撞箱。


Graphical
图形

Fixed low light emitting block items not matching the placed blocks brightness修复低的方块方块物品不匹配放置的方块的亮度的问题。Fixed mobs in mob spawners not being visible MCPE-56879修复刷怪笼中的生物不可见的问题。Maps in item frames no longer have lines through them MCPE-46154地图放置到物品展示框中，将不再有白线Fixed maps missing textures after reloading world MCPE-54228修复重载世界后，地图丢失材质的问题。Fixed issue where lighting wasn't refreshed when going through portals back into overworld MCPE-338144修复通过传送门回到主世界时，光照没有刷新的问题。Fixed the excessive hand bob motion caused by playing an animation on the hand and camera together MCPE-54072修复过多的手部摇晃运动。Items held by mobs should now render correctly生物握着的物品，现在会被正确的渲染。Lodestone Compass now renders properly in the inventory磁石指针现在会在背包中被正确的渲染。


User Interface
用户界面

Tweaked Server Tab navigation调整了服务器导览列表Creative Recipe Books show item groupings again合成书再次分组展示物品Added a background to title and subtitle text with adjustable opacity Opacity can be changed in the "Accessibility" tab in the Settings menu给titlesubtitle`添加了背景，可以在设置的"辅助功能“中设置背景的通明度。Added a background to the actionbar text used in the /title command The same background is also applied to the item text above the hotbar给使用title命令产生的actionbar增加背景，同样的背景也适用于物品栏上的物品名字。Smithing Table UI has been updated锻造台的 ui 更新了。


Commands
命令

Fixed a bug where bees and other new mobs were missing a non-"minecraft:" version for /summon commands. You should be able to spawn vanilla mobs without it! MCPE-58557修复了新增的生物，若不加 minecraft: 的前缀就无法生成 bug 。你应该可以直接召唤，而不需要加上这个。Added new overload for /replaceitem with an option for destroy (the old behavior) or keep (the command will return an error if an item occupies that slot)为 /replaceitem 增加了新的选项。直接替换（旧版本的方式）或者保持（如果某个物品已经位于这个栏位，就会返回一个错误）Fixed issue where the clear command would not clear damaged tools修复了 clear 命令不会清除有损耗的工具的问题。/setblock command fails on the new blocks if attempted with non-default state MCPE-65395setblock 如果在新增的方块使用非默认的方块状态，将会失败。/setblock command now works for more block statessetblock现在能使用更多的方块状态了。


Add-Ons and Scripting
Add-Ons 和脚本

Fixed knockback issue that stopped crates in “Rescue Mission Lava Town” Marketplace pack from moving when hit修复了一个击退相关的问题。这个问题导致了市场中的 “Rescue Mission Lava Town”中的箱子无法应攻击而移动的问题。Added a new loop mode to animations: now instead of omitting "loop" to have it stop playing when finished, or setting "loop": true to have it loop when finished, you can now say "loop": "hold_on_last_frame" to keep applying the last frame of animation增加了新的循环模式动画：现在无需设置为loop来达到完成时结束播放，或者设置 "loop": true 在完成时循环播放。你现在只需要设置 "loop": "hold_on_last_frame" 就能保持动画的最后一帧。A content error will now show up if a Range json node is defined as an array with a single value如果一个范围的 json 节点的数组只设置了一个值，现在将会显示一个错误。A content error will now show up if you use more than one Move Control Component, Jump Control Component, or Navigation Component如果你使用了超过一个的移动控制组件，跳跃控制组件，导航组件，现在会显示一个错误。Functions with a mix of invalid and valid commands will only execute the valid ones with command version 1.15 and below In these cases, the function name will not show up in the auto-suggestion list but can still be executed if typed out混杂了有效和无效的命令的函数，将只会执行其中有效的 1.15 版本一下的命令，这个函数的名称将不会出现在自动补全建议列表中。但是你直接输入还是能执行的。Starting on 1.16, functions with any invalid commands (for example incorrect selector syntax) will no longer register and cannot be called从 1.16 开始，如果函数中有着任何错误的命令（比如错误的选择器），那么将无法注册和使用。When setting the json variables "attack_interval_min" and "attack_interval_max", the component will now correctly throw a content error if the max is less than the min MCPE-63542现在设置 json 中 attack_interval_min 和 attack_interval_max 的数值时，如果最小值大于最大值，将会产生一个错误。Fixed issue where sounds would sometimes have incorrect settings applied to them leading to 2D sounds to play as 3D and vice versa修复了声音播放会使用错误的设置的问题，比如原本应 2d 播放的声音声音 3d 播放，或者反过来这样的问题。Fixed issue that was cutting off playing sound incorrectly, though can still easily occur if audio is loaded up that takes up a lot of memory修复了错误的切断声音的问题。虽然仍然容易发生，因为加载音频会占用大量的内存。Comments in JSON arrays no longer cause an error MCPE-40873json 的数组中使用注释，将不再导致错误。





相关地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe基岩版测试组安卓Google Play：https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpeWin10 Store：https://www.microsoft.com/zh-cn/store/p/xbox-insider-hub/9nblggh68vsk

外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Minecraft官网（内容英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文）Jason的Twitter（英文）Matt Booty的Twitter（英文）tomcc的Twitter（英文）MattGartzke的Twitter（英文）HelenAngel的Twitter（英文）Chupacaubrey的Twitter（英文）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）

replies.txt_content: 好神奇   這周基岩版更新好快

replies.author: DahnKun
replies.txt_content:
.63的三个对于be生电而言可能是重要的机制改动/特性修复:
1.Villagers will now harvest crops regardless of what crop amounts they have in their inventory MCPE-67694
村民现在将不管自己的背包中的作物，而去收获作物。
现在自动农场的效率会提高了
普通农村也不会看到两个沙雕村民在那里互相丢吃的了

2.
Mined Nether Sprouts no longer produce an invalid item that could not be used MCPE-74339
挖掘下界苗现在不会掉落特殊的非法方块。
这个其实没什么好说的，因为这个非法方块大家也都知道迟早要修复，不过感兴趣的人可以去b站上搜搜，这个非法方块当作挖掘工具会有一些神奇的特性

3.
Moving blocks now have the correct collision box  MCPE-62419
移动方块现在将会有正确的碰撞箱。
这个算是比较重要的一个修改，首先潜影盒打包机的设计能够被简化了；
其次因为这个修改，刷沙机又需要做出修改了；
总之mojang修改移动方块碰撞箱也不是一天两天的事情，不过就是每次都不知道mojang到底觉得什么样的碰撞箱才是正确的= =

目前个人看到的重要改动就这三个，其他的还是要通过实际测试来验证了。

DahnKun 发表于 2020-5-21 18:10
全自动？你是指用树木幽灵方块特性制造的全自动树场还是指用两种地狱两种菌皮的催熟机制制造的全自动树场 ...

replies.author: DahnKun
replies.txt_content:
cs1725 发表于 2020-5-22 15:45
地狱的菌才有可能做出来全自动，幽灵方块那个是bug，不用考虑。
be和je的生电的不同之处就在于be大部分生电技术都是依靠bug/特性，也就是官方未认可的程序行为，而je经过常年累月的开发，很多曾经被称为特性的程序行为已经被mojang所认可成为了机制。
所以我可以综合回复你四点：
1.mojang可从来没有表示过大型菌类的全自动农场是一种机制，仅仅以乐观态度来看是如此；
2.拒绝bug的be生电的后果是不堪设想的，最近mojang对于be的迷惑操作大家也是有目共睹，大部分玩家认为是合理的程序行为被mojang判定成bug来修复，这导致了相当多生电技术的操作困难化乃至于不可维持；
3.基于幽灵方块的全自动树场实际的技术含量并不低，其发现、模拟、利用乃至实现实际都是经过仔细雕琢考虑的 ；
4.如果您是je玩家，请您记住je生电一开始并非使用的是机制，je许多大家口中所谓的机制实际就是以前被大家认为的bug。

当然了，恶性bug虽然也是bug，我这里并非给它们狡辩，我也相信真正的生电玩家有辨识什么是恶性bug的能力。

replies.author: DahnKun
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 DahnKun 于 2020-5-28 21:15 编辑 
cs1725 发表于 2020-5-28 10:24
be大部分生电不是依赖于BUG，大型菌可以催出这点刚出来时被提交为bug，之后MOJANG在默认了。be的科技树你 ...
我给你数数基岩版哪些生电技术是基于bug的：农业方面：强制催熟是bug，这点我觉得很正确；
村庄方面：村庄堆叠属于bug，现在堆叠村庄式多村掠夺塔已经无法在高版本建造，这我忍了；
方块掉落方面，凋灵技术是要用到基岩的，获取基岩本身就是bug，你可能会说为什么不用迁越门基岩配含水方块笼，对不起那个要破基岩，破基岩也是bug，mojang更新新版本差点就把这个技术消灭了，这我也忍了；
刷怪塔方面：游走式生成架，挤压式生成架，伪露天，生成架设计方面的方块阻碍评估，全部都是基于bug的，这些新版本几乎全被mojang掀了，之前be那个吞实体的bug还差点把屑架给废了
玩红石机械，活塞靠实体渲染，毒察每秒自查100次，区块加载随机更新，就这三个就够be生电的红石器械喝上好几壶

你告诉我大部分不是依赖bug，你倒是给我说说看，你指的大部分是哪些？农业吗？be生电也就只配种田了是吧

还互补，还补充进度，我不酸人家je，但是你说说看现在眼看着1.16就要结束补充更新内容了，你告诉我be从je那里拿到了什么？
我要求也不高，mojang能把修复的部分弥补上就行，问题是他们做到了吗？
我说话可能是有点冲，但你跟我说我这三点基本错的，拜托你对be生电这间杜甫草堂有个清晰认识好吗，mojang更新之风吹满地，我们be生电就卷走三重茅了

tnt刷石机，afk刷石机，常规水流定时刷怪塔，村民全自动农场，抽水马桶半自动自动农场，阶梯式半自动农场，普通掠夺塔（不堆叠不能用)?，守卫者主世界/双维度农场，女巫塔（这三个机器照顾了基岩版，定点刷），全自动海泡菜机，凋零骷髅塔，恶魂塔（都有对应正常版本），掠夺兽的功能比je强很多，掠夺兽南瓜西瓜机，掠夺兽全自动刷雪机，活塞刷雪机，各种半自动全自动药水，全自动蜜蜂农场，各种快速熔炉，各种小蘑菇机，大蘑菇机，各种常规树场，猪灵交易机，分类机，主世界/下届猪人塔，照顾基岩版的极简刷花机。又不是非得用凋零，tnt同样可以做，舍不得用tnt,建立刷怪塔啊。刷怪塔tnt不够轰炸机世吞用，没考虑mojang前几个月发表的红石完善声明？全自动/afk地狱藤曼机，全自动地狱新的树场be也已经做出来了，be的推容，各种玄武岩机器，史莱姆农场，等等，这些都是bug?
